partial_credit_policy.description: If output is incorrect, award up to 60% of marks in that category for reasonable programming statements. Use grader judgement for minor/partial/mostly incorrect cases.

general_structure_of_invoice.description: General structure of invoice (format/sections). Ignore minor alignment issues.

correct_calculation_summary_total_vat_bi.description: Correct calculation of summary (total, VAT, bill amount)

delivery_schedule.description: Delivery schedule display and base charge (10 marks).

correct_display_of_delivery_schedule.description: Correct display of delivery schedule (ignore alignment issues)

programming_style.description: Style: spacing, comments, variable names (5 marks).

spaces_and_indentation.description: Good use of spaces and indentation

grading_notes.marks_awarded_for_incorrect_output: Award up to ~60% of marks in a category if output is incorrect but reasoning/code is reasonable. Example guidance: minor error caused by previous calculation -> ~60% of that category; partially correct statements -> 40-60%; mostly incorrect -> ~20%; total incorrect/absent -> 0.
